description:
Alerts You whenever a thing is copied to the clipboard


I love i ignored editing the code of my program until later and decided to drop an update to it
Issues Fixed:
- Fixed Issue where the program crashes on the 2nd time the about window is opened (#1)
- Fixed issue where you can just spam click on Set Position to get more "Previews" when it should be one at a time (#2)
What been added:
- @catppuccin themes straight into the program (love ya)
- Like, some languages?
- Installer has a link to learn how to use the program
- Welcome first toast (if you are upgrading from v0.1.6 to v0.1.7, ignore the toast once you update please, do not open a issue because of it)
- Hopefully and MAYBE a microsoft store version of the thing???? (More soon)
Full Changelog: v0.1.6...v0.1.7
